com.sensorstack

Class DiscretePacketInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensorstack.DiscretePacketInfo

  • public class DiscretePacketInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    DiscretePacketInfo class represents the parameters needed to fetch, unpack and validate discrete data packet comprising values from multiple discrete sensors. All data members have been initialised.
